articles.content: It was confirmed that Ngidi is expected to return to action in April in a domestic competition in a statement released by Cricket South Africa (CSA). This will put him in contention for playing for P… [+536 chars]

articles.author: icc
articles.title: Wade sets sights on T20 World Cup after calling time on red-ball career - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Matthew Wade announces decision to retire from the longest format ahead of the Marsh Sheffield Shield final
articles.content:
Matthew Wade, the Australia wicketkeeper-batter, announced his decision to retire from red-ball cricket.
Wade, who postponed his arrival at the Indian Premier League (IPL) to participate in the Shie… [+527 chars]
